history.proof: intros x1 x2 xs1 xs2 H1 H2. revert x1 x2 H2. induction H1 as [|x3 x4 xs3 xs4 H3 H4 IH]. -- intros x1 x2 H2. simpl. auto. -- intros x1 x2 H2. simpl. qsimpl time: 1.

ctx: intros x1 x2 xs1 xs2 H1 H2.
induction H1 as [|x3 x4 xs3 xs4 H3 H4 IH].
exceptions.exn: In environment L : Language minL : MinimumLanguage L Gamma : Provable L minAX : MinimumAxiomatization L Gamma prodp : expr -> expr -> expr Mono : Monotonicity L Gamma prodp x3, x4 : expr xs3, xs4 : list expr H3 : |-- x3 --> x4 H4 : Forall2 (fun x1 x2 : expr => |-- x1 --> x2) xs3 xs4 IH : forall x1 x2 : expr, |-- x1 --> x2 -> |-- fold_left prodp xs3 x1 --> fold_left prodp xs4 x2 x1, x2 : expr H2 : |-- x1 --> x2 Unable to unify "Monotonicity L Gamma prodp" with "|-- fold_left prodp xs3 (prodp x1 x3) --> fold_left prodp xs4 (prodp x2 x4)".

ctx: intros x1 x2 xs1 xs2 H1 H2.
induction H1 as [|x3 x4 xs3 xs4 H3 H4 IH].

original: intros x1 x2 xs1 xs2 H1 H2. revert x1 x2 H2. induction H1 as [|x3 x4 xs3 xs4 H3 H4 IH]. -- intros x1 x2 H2. simpl. auto. -- intros x1 x2 H2. simpl. apply Mono. ++ apply H2. ++ apply IH. auto.
